answers.answer: I received a call the next day letting me know i had it.
Oh OK Well hopefully I don't receive any calls then! When they found out about you What did they do to you??
I made an appointment for like 3 days later and they put me on a super strict diet :(
Oh really??!:( What kind of strict diet?? And anything else you had to do differently? I'm freaking out because I do not want to have it I heard you have to have baby earlier too?..
I got a call the next day and had to go do the 2 hour test but passed thank god. Yeah a lot of moms with GD deliver earlier because they tend to have bigger babies.

Oh that's good you passed!! And Well I had an ultrasound also and my baby is measuring 1 lb 13 oz I'm 25 weeks right now and the tech said she's average. So hopefully I don't have it and I don't get any call tomorrow!!!!
I did mine n the never called ur broght it up at my appointments so everyone said no news is good newsI guess cuz if I had it they would have call or told me
They just told me at my next appointment that everything was fine so I guess no call is good news
I didnt get a call either, found out at my next appointmebt that i had passed, they only call if its concerning
Oh OK thank you ladies! :) hopefully I don't get no call from them today!
I found out that same day!! I have GD its hard..... but one thing for sure drink alot of water!! Hope all comes out great for u... my princess will be born on friday via c section!!!

It depends on the office, i failed the 1 hour and never got a call... My ob came in the room at my last appointment and asked if I had taken the 3 hour yet.....I was past confused, I had no idea what he was talking about. I was 3 points off, I doing the 3 hour next week. I'll be 31 weeks

Angelle09 I'm sorry it's hard enough just being pregnant than getting gd that's Why I'm so worried! And I heard if you get it in pregnancy you are more likely room get diabetes in the future: (. And Congrats on your princess and with your csection: )!

Allipiesmommy I think they should have called you the next day I mean we want to know those things asap!  And Well goodluck!  Hopefully you pass the 3 hour answer not have it!! I'm just going to wait all day hopefully I don't received a call though.
When I did mine they called the same day saying i didn't have it.

question: When they get the results do they call you if you do have gestation diabetes or does the doctor tell you next Tim's you have an appointment? I just have mine done today and I was wondering
title: sugar test for gd???
